description: This file contains C source code implementing functions for parsing and handling Zigbee device messages, device details, configuration, and status information, specifically related to legacy Zigbee security and device management within a Zigbee SDK-based system.

methods.name: bool parseDeviceInfoMessage(const uint8_t * message,uint16_t messageLen,uCDeviceInfoMessage * deviceInfoMessage)
methods.description: Parses a message buffer to populate a uCDeviceInfoMessage structure with device firmware, type, status, configuration, and other details.

methods.name: char * deviceInfoMessageToString(uCDeviceInfoMessage * message)
methods.description: Converts a uCDeviceInfoMessage structure into a human-readable string representation.

methods.name: bool getLegacyDeviceDetails(uCDeviceType devType,uint32_t firmwareVersion,LegacyDeviceDetails ** details)
methods.description: Retrieves device details and classification based on device type and firmware version, allocating and populating a LegacyDeviceDetails structure.

methods.name: LegacyDeviceDetails * cloneLegacyDeviceDetails(const LegacyDeviceDetails * src)
methods.description: Creates a deep copy of a LegacyDeviceDetails structure.

methods.name: void legacyDeviceDetailsDestroy(LegacyDeviceDetails * details)
methods.description: Frees memory associated with a LegacyDeviceDetails structure and its dynamic fields.

methods.name: LegacyDeviceConfig getLegacyDeviceConfig(uCDeviceType devType)
methods.description: Returns default configuration parameters for a given device type.

methods.name: bool getLegacyDeviceConfigMessage(uCDeviceType devType,uint8_t devNum,uint8_t region,uint8_t ** payload,uint8_t * payloadLen)
methods.description: Creates a byte buffer that encodes the device configuration message for a specific device type, device number, and region.

methods.name: bool parseDeviceStatus(uint8_t endpointId,const uint8_t * message,uint16_t messageLen,uCStatusMessage * status)
methods.description: Parses a message buffer into a uCStatusMessage structure containing device status, battery, temperature, and possibly extra information.

methods.name: bool parseKeypadMessage(uint8_t * message,uint16_t messageLen,uCKeypadMessage * keypadMessage)
methods.description: Parses a message buffer received from a keypad device into a uCKeypadMessage structure.

methods.name: bool parseKeyfobMessage(uint8_t * message,uint16_t messageLen,uCKeyfobMessage * keyfobMessage)
methods.description: Parses a message buffer from a keyfob device into a uCKeyfobMessage structure.

methods.name: uint32_t getFirmwareVersionFromDeviceInfoMessage(uCDeviceInfoMessage deviceInfoMessage)
methods.description: Extracts the firmware version as a 32-bit integer from the device info message.

methods.name: uint32_t convertLegacyFirmwareVersionToUint32(const uint8_t firmwareVer[3])
methods.description: Converts a 3-byte firmware version array into a 32-bit integer.

methods.name: void legacyDeviceUpdateCommonResources(const DeviceServiceCallbacks * deviceService,const uint64_t eui64,const uCStatusMessage * status,bool isBatteryLow)
methods.description: Updates common device resources like signal quality, RSSI, battery status, and temperature on the system's resource model, given device status.

methods.name: uCLegacyDeviceClassification getLegacyDeviceClassification(uCDeviceType devType)
methods.description: Returns a default classification for a given device type (here always UC_DEVICE_CLASS_UNKNOWN).

ctags.name: getLegacyDeviceConfigMessage
ctags.pattern: /^bool getLegacyDeviceConfigMessage(uCDeviceType devType, uint8_t devNum, uint8_t region, uint8_t*/

ctags.name: legacyDeviceUpdateCommonResources
ctags.signature: (const DeviceServiceCallbacks * deviceService,const uint64_t eui64,const uCStatusMessage * status,bool isBatteryLow)

ctags.name: parseDeviceInfoMessage
ctags.pattern: /^bool parseDeviceInfoMessage(const uint8_t* message, uint16_t messageLen, uCDeviceInfoMessage* de/

ctags.name: parseDeviceStatus
ctags.pattern: /^bool parseDeviceStatus(uint8_t endpointId, const uint8_t* message, uint16_t messageLen, uCStatus/
